com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api

Interface Document


  • public interface Document
    Interface to be implemented by specific documents.

    • Method Detail

      • setValue

        Document setValue(java.lang.String field,
                  java.lang.Object value)
        Sets a value in a document field. If the field had already a value it is overwritten by the new value.
        Parameters:
        field - Name of the field to set.
        value - Value to set on the field.
        Returns:
        The document instance with the new value for the field.

      • setContextualizedValue

        Document setContextualizedValue(java.lang.String field,
                                java.lang.String context,
                                java.lang.Object value)
        Sets a value in a document field for an specific context. If the field had already a value for the given context it is overwritten by the new value. For non contextualized values use null context.
        Parameters:
        field - Name of the field to set.
        value - Value to set on the field.
        context - String with the context name.
        Returns:
        The document instance with the new value for the field.

      • setValue

        <T> Document setValue(FieldDescriptor<T> field,
                      T value)
        Sets a value in a document field. If the field had already a value it is overwritten by the new value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the content field.
        Parameters:
        field - descriptor of the field to set.
        value - Value to set on the field.
        Returns:
        The document instance with the new value for the field.

        Document addValue(java.lang.String field,
                  java.lang.Object value)
        Adds a value to a document field. The field should be multivalued.
        Parameters:
        field - Name of the field to add.
        value - Value to add on the field.
        Returns:
        The document instance with the added value in the field.
